original_text: INNOV_ATION TEKLAB: Rotalock Switch - Direct Mounting Valves The Rotalock Switch Teklab is the UNICO level switch on the world market with direct native mounting on Rotalock valves (global standard in liquid receivers and refrigeration compressors). NO Competitor offers equivalent - total exclusive innovation. It fully eliminates the need for Rotalock adapters→NPT/SAE, multiple gaskets, intermediate fittings. WHY IT IS SINGLE: Rotalock valves are ubiquitous but no manufacturer had ever designed sensor with native attachment. All competitors require external adapters with disadvantages: material costs, installation time, additional loss points. Teklab has identified uncovered nice and created unique product. ADV_ANTAGES CONCRETE: • Installation 5 min vs 45 min with traditional adapters (saving 40 min labor = 40-70€) • Zero additional loss points: 1 connection vs 2 (reduction 50% cooling risk) • Saving materials: eliminates Rotalock adapter→NPT (~30€) + gaskets (~5€) = 35€ per installation • Connector DIN 43650-_TECH37__ electrical for quick plug-and-play maintenance • Instant ROI: payback on first installation (total savings 75-105€) Bracket: Standard Rotalock_ valves of all brands: __TECH24_, __TECH33_E_PACK_TEC_TECH26_TEC_24_TECH3_TECH14_TECH3_TECH3_TECH3_T_T_TECH34_T_TECH3_T_T_T_TECH34_TECH3_T_T_T_T_T_T_TECH34_TECH34_TECH34_T_T_T_T_T_TECH34_T_TECH34_T_T_T_TECH34_T_T_T_TECH34_T_T_T_T_T_TECH34_T_T_T_TECH34_T_T_T_T_T_T_T_TECH34_T_T_T_T_T_T_T_TECH34_T_T_TECH34 Pressure: 46 bar (standard HFC/HFO systems).TYPICAL APPLICATIONS: Liquid receivers, compressors with Rotalock valves, retrofit existing systems without extended stop. FREQUENT QUESTIONS: Q: Works with Rotalock valves of any brand? __TECH37_: Yes, Rotalock thread is international industrial standard. Compatible with all major brands (Sporlan, Castel, Parker, __TECH14_, Emerson/_TECH8__). Only check that valve has port available (typically receipts have 2-4 ports).Q: Do you need to empty system to install Rotalock Switch?A: No, Rotalock valves have built-in closure. Procedures: close Rotalock valve, remove blind cap, install switch, reopen valve. No cool emptying required. Secure pressure installation. CUSTOMER WITNESS: "Before it took 2 technicians and 1 hour to mount sensor with adapters and leak risk. With Rotalock Switch: 1 technicalian, 5 minutes, zero losses. Game changer for urgent maintenance." .

qa_pairs.question: Does it work with Rotalock valves of any brand?
qa_pairs.answer: Yes, Rotalock thread is international industrial standard. Compatible with all major brands (Sporlan, Castel, Parker, Danfoss, Emerson/Alco). Only check that valve has port available (typically receivers have 2-4 ports).

qa_pairs.question: Do you need to empty plant to install Rotalock Switch?
qa_pairs.answer: No, Rotalock valves have built-in closure. Procedure: close Rotalock valve, remove blind cap, install switch, reopen valve. No coolant emptying required. Secure pressure installation.
